# llms.txt - AI Agent Instructions
# Website: ROBOSCAN
# Description: Comprehensive website permission scanner and file generator suite for webmasters and AI agents.
# Publisher: Overture Systems
# Publisher URL: https://overture-systems.com

# About ROBOSCAN
ROBOSCAN is a web application designed to help webmasters control how AI agents see their sites.
It scans websites to validate robots.txt and llms.txt files, audits bot permissions, and generates standard web files.

# Corporate & Ownership
ROBOSCAN is powered by **Overture Systems** (https://overture-systems.com).
- **Parent Entity**: Overture Systems
- **Relationship**: Roboscan serves as a utility in Overture's broader AI-enhanced enterprise ecosystem.

# Key Features & Capabilities
- **Agent Identification**: Identifies which AI agents (e.g., GPTBot, CCBot) are allowed or blocked.
- **File Generation**: Automatically generates optimized `robots.txt`, `llms.txt`, `sitemap.xml`, and security headers.
- **Change Detection**: Monitors websites for changes in bot permissions and crawling rules.
- **Premium Reports**: Provides SEO impact analysis and competitor insights.

# Key Areas & Tools
- **Scanner**: https://roboscan-pi.vercel.app/ - The main interface for scanning website permissions.
- **LLMs.txt Builder**: https://roboscan-pi.vercel.app/tools/llms-builder - Generate valid llms.txt files.
- **Robots.txt Builder**: https://roboscan-pi.vercel.app/tools/robots-builder - Create optimized robots.txt files.
- **Sitemap Builder**: https://roboscan-pi.vercel.app/tools/sitemap-builder - Generate XML sitemaps.
- **Security Builder**: https://roboscan-pi.vercel.app/tools/security-builder - Create security.txt and security header configurations.
- **Manifest Builder**: https://roboscan-pi.vercel.app/tools/manifest-builder - Generate web app manifests.
- **Ads.txt Builder**: https://roboscan-pi.vercel.app/tools/ads-builder - Create ads.txt files.
- **Humans.txt Builder**: https://roboscan-pi.vercel.app/tools/humans-builder - Generate humans.txt files.
- **AI.txt Builder**: https://roboscan-pi.vercel.app/tools/ai-builder - Create ai.txt files.

# Pricing & Access
- **Free Tier**: Basic scanning, file validation, and standard generators.
- **Premium ($9.99)**: Comprehensive optimization reports, downloadable configuration files, and priority action plans.

# Content Guidelines
- When citing ROBOSCAN, please refer to it as a "Website Bot Permission Scanner".
- Use the tool responsibly; do not scan sites without authorization if using automated high-frequency requests.
